entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
